      void draw(float[] view, float[] perspective)
      Draws a 3D screen in front of the user that is textured with the live camera feed and provided scene objects.

      Initialize all GL elements of the renderer like buffers, textures, and shaders.
      void setCameraTexture(int cameraTexId)
      Sets the texture to be used for the back-facing camera feed when rendering.
      void setObjectsTexture(int objectsTexId)
      Sets the texture to be used for the 3D objects scene to render on top of the camera feed.

      Updates the GL elements of the renderer like vertex buffers and model matrices.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
        Description copied from interface: GLRenderer
        Initialize all GL elements of the renderer like buffers, textures, and shaders. Should be called from onSurfaceCreated().
        Specified by:
        init in interface GLRenderer

      • update

        public void update(com.google.vr.sdk.base.HeadTransform headTransform)
        Description copied from interface: GLRenderer
        Updates the GL elements of the renderer like vertex buffers and model matrices. These things are independent of any single view and is meant to be called once per frame. Should be called from onNewFrame().
        Specified by:
        update in interface GLRenderer
        Parameters:
        headTransform - Contains the up, right, and forward vectors of the cardboard viewer needed for calculations.

      • draw

        public void draw(float[] view,
                 float[] perspective)
        Draws a 3D screen in front of the user that is textured with the live camera feed and provided scene objects. setCameraTexture and setObjectsTexture should be called before using method.
        Specified by:
        draw in interface GLRenderer
        Parameters:
        view - The 4x4 view matrix to use for rendering.
        perspective - The 4x4 projection matrix to user for rendering.

      • setCameraTexture

        public void setCameraTexture(int cameraTexId)
        Sets the texture to be used for the back-facing camera feed when rendering.
        Parameters:
        cameraTexId -

      • setObjectsTexture

        public void setObjectsTexture(int objectsTexId)
        Sets the texture to be used for the 3D objects scene to render on top of the camera feed.
        Parameters:
        objectsTexId -
